scripts.description: Analyze Python script for compliance with coding standards and best practices.

functions.name: function_exists
functions.details: Check if all required functions are defined and implemented in the script.

functions.name: error_handling
functions.details: Ensure all functions have appropriate error handling mechanisms to prevent failures.

functions.name: optimization
functions.details: Check for code optimization opportunities (e.g., removing redundant code, improving performance).

functions.name: unused_imports
functions.details: Detect any imports that are not used in the script and can be safely removed.

functions.name: comments_and_docs
functions.details: Ensure that all functions and classes have proper comments and docstrings for readability.

functions.name: idempotency
functions.details: Check for idempotency to prevent repeating actions that should only occur once (e.g., applying changes or setting states).
